info.title: Cloud Regions Geo API
info.description: API to get geographic data for cloud provider regions

get.summary: Get all regions for a specific cloud provider
get.description: Returns geographic data for all regions of a specific cloud provider

200.description: Successfully returned geographic data for cloud provider regions

500.description: Failed to create deployment version channel
Failed to delete deployment version channel

systemId.description: The ID of the system to create the deployment for

description.example: This is a deployment for my system

jobAgentId.description: The ID of the job agent to use for the deployment

jobAgentConfig.description: The configuration for the job agent

retryCount.description: The number of times to retry the deployment

resourceSelector.description: The resource selector for the deployment

directory.description: The directory path of the environment

post.summary: Acknowledge a job for an agent
post.description: Marks a job as acknowledged by the agent

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The ID of the job agent

200.description: Successfully retrieved or created the agent

post.summary: Create a relationship between a job and a resource

error.example: Job with specified ID not found
Relationship between job and resource already exists

post.summary: Create a relationship between two resources

fromIdentifier.description: The identifier of the resource to connect

toIdentifier.description: The identifier of the resource to connect to

patch.summary: Sets the resource for a provider.

workspaceId.description: The workspace ID of the system

200.description: Successfully retrieved or created the resource provider

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter to apply to the resources

timezone.description: Timezone of the region in UTC format

approver.description: Null when status is pending, contains approver details when approved or rejected

googleServiceAccountEmail.description: The email of the Google service account attached to the workspace

awsRoleArn.description: The ARN of the AWS role attached to the workspace

workspaceId.description: The workspace ID of the system

UpdateDeployment.description: Schema for updating a deployment (all fields optional)

approvalRequirement.description: The approval requirement of the policy

successType.description: If a policy depends on an environment, whether or not the policy requires all, some, or optional successful releases in the environment

successMinimum.description: If a policy depends on an environment, the minimum number of successful releases in the environment

concurrencyLimit.description: The maximum number of concurrent releases in the environment

rolloutDuration.description: The duration of the rollout in milliseconds

minimumReleaseInterval.description: The minimum interval between releases in milliseconds

releaseSequencing.description: If a new release is created, whether it will wait for the current release to finish before starting, or cancel the current release

directory.description: The directory path of the environment

externalId.description: External job identifier (e.g. GitHub workflow run ID)
